modName: Pyrrha Nikos - Female Dark Elf Companion
summary: Another companion mod which adds a female dark elf follower.
descriptionHtml:
(PLEASE READ: Ok so this is like my first mod and I'm still new to this. People have been having problems and I know what the reason for these problems is but I don't know how to fix it nor can I be bothered to do anything about it. Manually installing the mod should get it to work, but there are some texture problems which I still haven't got around to fixing, anyway...)

Actually based off my ingame character, this mod simply adds a female dark elf companion who is marriageable.

You can find her in the Bannered Mare in Whiterun.

I highly recommend using these mods:
Calientes Female Body: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/2666/?
Less Harsh Elves: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/369/?
or Better Females by Bella: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/2812/?
cover eyes: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/4869/?

Armour seen in the pictures comes from Jmenaru's Demon Hunter mod: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/29419//?
author: yoshilin
